name: H4x0r (Nocturne Games)
description:
Travel the virtual world and hack the 100 most important mainframes to prove that you are the most l33t of all hackers! To do this you must poke every sector of the mainframe once only, unless it is a special sector that permits you to peek and poke it. Watch out for sector seek points too, as they will move you about the mainframe!

Controls

All menus and gameplay elements are controlled by the left mouse button. In game, you may click once to perform a single move, or click and drag to perform a continuous move. Click anywhere on hacked tiles to undo until that point.
